tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
**** ******* * **** *** ** *****
I am glad, I met Dr.Amruta for my treatment. I liked her when I met her for consultation itself. She was pleasant while explaining me the course of treatment I might need. When she started the procedure, she was very gentle and calm. She took time to explain every step she was doing. When some step was taking longer, she even told me "Just few more minutes and I will be done." She went an extra mile to make me feel comfortable, when I was feeling little restless during the treatment. I would highly recommend her to anyone who is looking for a great dentist!
reply_text: Thank you so much Shweta...it means a lot to me...god bless and take care...
